ai-patthana8.60:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.60:1.1_0: You shouldn’t give up the cause for the sake of developing the teaching ...
ai-patthana8.60:2.1_0: Not for the sake of developing the teaching ...
ai-patthana8.60:3.1_0: Not abandoning the root of can be given up, and the for the sake of development, not the sake of developing, and for the sake of developing the paths of development.
ai-patthana8.60:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
